name: Muppy The Bunny: The Danger of Wishes
name_original: Muppy The Bunny: The Danger of Wishes
description: Muppy The Bunny : The Danger of Wishes is a 2D platforming game inspired by many early platformers 90's. There is a bunch to do in this game, like running from a giant cat, flying a plane, using a parachute, swimming, driving a mine-cart. The game is set in a world before earth's history(as we know it) even started when the first war ever happened. Play as Muppy and fight his brother, Dark and his minions while collecting 41 wish orbs to save the world. And a special thanks to Noah B. Wilson for letting me use his music.
